objects.name: informasi_text
objects.string: Game ini mengajak anak kelas 3–6 SD untuk belajar dan memahami tahapan metamorfosis sempurna dan tidak sempurna, serta mengenal pertumbuhan makhluk hidup secara menyenangkan.

content.text: Game ini mengajak anak kelas 3–6 SD untuk belajar dan memahami tahapan metamorfosis sempurna dan tidak sempurna, serta mengenal pertumbuhan makhluk hidup secara menyenangkan.

objects.name: informasi_text2
objects.string:
Mekanisme Game : 
  1. Pemain memilih kostum
  2. Di setiap level, mereka bertemu makhluk (kupu-kupu, katak, belalang)
  3. Tapi… proses pertumbuhannya terganggu oleh "Makhluk Pengganggu Alam"
  4. Kamu pun membantu proses metamorphosisnya
muncul gambar hewan + 3-4 tahap pertumbuhannya
(misal: telur → ulat → kepompong → kupu-kupu)
  1. Jika benar: 
      Makhluk tumbuh, musuh kalah → “Kamu berhasil menyelamatkanku!” Dapat bintang atau kartu 
      metamorfosis (kartu dengan gambar kupu kupu)
  2. Jika salah: Musuh mengganggu perkembangan → “akan ada suara tertawa jahat” dan tulisan untuk 
      kembali mengulangi permainan

content.text:
Mekanisme Game : 
  1. Pemain memilih kostum
  2. Di setiap level, mereka bertemu makhluk (kupu-kupu, katak, belalang)
  3. Tapi… proses pertumbuhannya terganggu oleh "Makhluk Pengganggu Alam"
  4. Kamu pun membantu proses metamorphosisnya
muncul gambar hewan + 3-4 tahap pertumbuhannya
(misal: telur → ulat → kepompong → kupu-kupu)
  1. Jika benar: 
      Makhluk tumbuh, musuh kalah → “Kamu berhasil menyelamatkanku!” Dapat bintang atau kartu 
      metamorfosis (kartu dengan gambar kupu kupu)
  2. Jika salah: Musuh mengganggu perkembangan → “akan ada suara tertawa jahat” dan tulisan untuk 
      kembali mengulangi permainan

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: ButtonStates
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Use any object as a button and change appearance according to user interactions.
description: Use the "Button states" behavior to track user interactions with an object, including:
Add additional behaviors to make juicy buttons with animated responses to user input:

events.comment: The "Validated" state only last one frame.
Make sure the cursor position is only checked once per frame.
Touches are always pressed, so ShouldCheckHovering doesn't matter.

eventsFunctions.description: Reset the state of the button.
eventsFunctions.name: ResetState

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is not used.
eventsFunctions.name: IsIdle

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button was just clicked.
eventsFunctions.name: IsClicked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the cursor is hovered over the button.
eventsFunctions.name: IsHovered

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is either hovered or pressed but not hovered.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFocused

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is currently being pressed with mouse or touch.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPressed

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is currently being pressed outside with mouse or touch.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPressedOutside

eventsFunctions.description: the touch id that is using the button or 0 if none.
eventsFunctions.name: TouchId

eventsFunctions.description: the idle state effect of the object.

eventsFunctions.description: the pressed state effect of the object.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: SpriteToggleSwitch
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Toggle switch that users can click or touch.
description: Toggle switch that users can click or touch. The switch can be customized with sprites.
There are ready-to-use toggle switches in the asset-store [settings UI pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=settings-ui-settings-ui).

changelog.breaking: - Toggle switches now use "variants", allowing easy swapping of their visual aspect. You will have to make some adjustments to existing toggle switches in your project. Follow this [migration documentation](https://wiki.gdevelop.io/gdevelop5/objects/custom-objects-prefab-template/migrate-to-variants/) to do these changes.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the events are running for the editor.
eventsFunctions.name: IsInGameEdition
eventsFunctions.sentence: Events are running for the editor

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: The finite state machine used internally by the switch object.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: SwitchFSM

eventsFunctions.name: IsChecked

eventsFunctions.name: HasJustBeenChecked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the toggle switch was unchecked in the current frame.
eventsFunctions.name: HasJustBeenUnchecked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the toggle switch was toggled in the current frame.
eventsFunctions.name: HasJustBeenToggled

eventsFunctions.description: Check (or uncheck) the toggle switch.
eventsFunctions.name: SetChecked

events.comment: Avoid a started touch to interfere with a state change from events.

eventsFunctions.description: Toggle the switch.
eventsFunctions.name: ToggleChecked

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: westboy, daliyoucefmedakram@gmail.com, @bouh
eventsFunctionsExtensions.fullName: Auto typing animation for text ("typewriter" effect)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: AutoTyping
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Reveal a text one letter after the other.
description: Reveal a text one letter after the other (a "typewriter" effect).
It can be used for dialogue scenes or visual novels on Text and Bitmap Text objects.
The top-down RPG example uses this extension ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://top-down-rpg)).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Reveal a text one letter after the other.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: AutoTyping

events.comment: Temporary add the next word and check if it's adding a new line.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the full text has been typed.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFinished

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a character has just been typed. Useful for triggering sound effects.
eventsFunctions.name: HasJustTyped

eventsFunctions.description: Restart typing from the beginning of text. The autotyping also start automatically when a new text is set for the object.
eventsFunctions.name: RestartFromBeginning
eventsFunctions.sentence: Restart typing from the beginning on _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Jump to a specific position in the text. Positions start at "0" and increase by one for every character.
eventsFunctions.name: JumpToPosition

eventsFunctions.description: Show the full text.
eventsFunctions.name: ShowFullText

eventsFunctions.description: the time between characters beign typed.
eventsFunctions.name: Interval

propertyDescriptors.label: Detect if a new text character was just displayed
propertyDescriptors.name: CharacterJustAdded
